official_title: Do Patients Undergoing Dermatologic Surgery Prefer the Use of Traditional Curved Iris Scissors or the Wuennenberg Modified Curved Iris Scissors?
inclusion_criteria:
* Adult (18 years or older)
* non-pregnant
* patients being treated with Mohs micrographic surgery or excision on the head and neck
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Patients not meeting above inclusion criteria will be excluded.
